data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peng, Lingfei, Xiang, Jiawei, Liu, Qifei (2018): Three new species of Zaischnopsis Ashmead (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea: Eupelmidae) from Southern China, with redescription of Zaischnopsis tubatius (Walker). Zootaxa 4524 (2): 200-212, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4524.2.4|8 occurrences
